title: Meditation and Uplifting Music by Jon Peniel (atlantis.to)
description:
These are a bunch of songs made by Jon Peniel (author of "The Children of The Law of One and the Lost Teachings of Atlantis", an amazing book on spiritual development) and his friends. They can be found from the various genre links on this page http://www.atlantis.to/music2/music-therapy-sound-therapy.htm

This torrent includes:


Meditation:
- Homecoming
- Crystal Gong Chakra Meditation
- Didgeridoo Orchestra
- Didgeridoo and Crystal Gong

Instrumental:
- Going UP?
- Singing Trees

Environmental:
- Maui Seashore

Singer/Songwriter:
- Sentimental
- Guardian Angel

It also includes a "song" (don't know what to call it) from this page http://www.atlantis.to/music2/sound-music-therapy.htm

Meditation Sound Therapy:
- Transformation

This last one has the same "background noises" as Transformation but instead of music on top it has "affirmations" which are positive goal reminding phrases. This isn't music but its great for meditation. From this page http://www.atlantis.to/music2/sound-therapy-music-therapy.htm

Guided Meditation Sound Therapy:
- Spiritual Development

I actually bought all of these, they are very good and spiritual, please seed them so as many people can benefit as possible. Also I strongly recommend reading his book with a long title, I mentioned it's name before. There's torrents of it all over the internet but theres also a readable and downloadable online version I uploaded on Scribd: http://www.scribd.com/doc/15830682/The-Children-of-the-Law-of-One-and-the-Lost-Teachings-of-Atlantis-by-Jon-Peniel  Also you can check my Scribd profile for more books by him.

All of these songs are good for meditation other than the two sets of signer/songwriter songs, theyre more for normal listening. "Transformation" and "Crystal Gong Chakra Meditation" are extremely good for meditation.
